questions:
What is the photo about?
A) Nature and landscapes
B) Daily life and people
C) Art and culture
D) Wildlife and animals

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A peaceful nature scene
B) A sports event
C) An art installation
D) A family gathering

What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A group of people
B) A piece of art on the wall
C) A natural landscape
D) A historical monument

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A tree
B) A sculpture
C) A framed object and a window
D) A person

What is in the background of the photo?
A) Mountains
B) A painted wall
C) A busy street
D) A forest

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) Grass
B) A wooden floor
C) A lake
D) A car

What is the color of the light illuminating the art installation?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Green
D) Yellow

What is covering the window on the right?
A) Curtains
B) A metal grate
C) A wooden board
D) A glass panel

What is the color of the wall in the photo?
A) Red
B) White
C) Blue
D) Green

What is the color of the frame around the object on the left?
A) Black
B) White
C) Gray
D) Brown

What is the color of the frame around the window on the right?
A) Black
B) White
C) Gray
D) Brown

What is the texture of the floor in the photo?
A) Smooth and shiny
B) Rough and uneven
C) Carpeted
D) Sandy

What is the lighting condition in the room?
A) Bright daylight
B) Dim artificial light
C) Natural sunlight
D) Dark with no light

What is the dominant color scheme of the photo?
A) Warm tones
B) Cool tones
C) Earthy tones
D) Neon tones

What is the style of the art installation?
A) Classical
B) Modern
C) Abstract
D) Realistic

What kind of exhibition might this be part of?
A) Historical artifacts
B) Contemporary art
C) Natural history
D) Photography

What is the position of the wooden board on the window?
A) Vertically
B) Horizontally
C) Diagonally
D) None of the above

What is the condition of the wooden planks on the wall?
A) New and polished
B) Old and worn
C) Clean
D) Rusty and metallic

How many frames are visible in the photo?
A) One
B) Two
C) Three
D) Four

What is the shape of the frames in the photo?
A) Circular
B) Triangular
C) Rectangular
D) Hexagonal

What is the relationship between the framed object and the window?
A) They are part of the same art piece
B) They are unrelated
C) They are part of a larger narrative
D) They are from different time periods

What is the texture of the wall in the photo?
A) Smooth
B) Rough
C) Textured/ Patterned 
D) Metallic

What type of lighting is used in the photo?
A) Natural light
B) LED lighting
C) Incandescent lighting
D) Fluorescent lighting

What is the position of the art installation on the wall?
A) Centered
B) Left-aligned
C) Right-aligned
D) Bottom-aligned

What is the dominant element in the photo?
A) Color
B) Texture
C) Light
D) Shape

What is the possible historical context of the object inside the frame?
A) Ancient artifact
B) Modern tool
C) Historical weapon
D) Contemporary sculpture

What is the relationship between the colors in the photo?
A) Complementary
B) Contrasting
C) Monochromatic
D) Analogous

What color dominates the wall in the photo?
A) Red
B) Green
C) White
D) Yellow
